entry.title: The omni selector
entry.content:
devX: Why to use jquery if you can do it with browser API. Oh, wait! jquery can do it too?. So let's use both! Why not?

javascript var myurl = document.getElementById("captureUrl").value; //5 lines below var data = $("#captureUrl").val();

What's wrong here

  • Use two different ways to get the same data

How to conquer

  • use the same selector

javascript var myurl = data = $("#captureUrl").val();
